domain
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  domain.Configuration

public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds all the configuration managers for the GameClient instance.

Method Detail

instantiate

protected static Configuration instantiate()
This method is used to get a Configuration instance following the Single-Town model

Returns:
a Configuration instance.

getFiredAction

protected FiredAction getFiredAction(int k)
This method returns the stablished FiredAction for an event code.

Parameters:
k - The event code to look for it's mapped FiredAction
Returns:
The FiredAction assigned to this event code, or null if there are no FiredAction mapped for the given event code.

initializeControls

protected void initializeControls(java.util.ArrayList<FiredActionable> firedActionables)
This method is called by the GameClient to initialize the Control hashmap. If a KeyException is raised due to a duplicity key in the Controls controlmap HashMap, the System will be shutdown. (We will perform that bad praxis in a next framework release)

Parameters:
firedActionables - An ArrayList containing all the firedActionables instances from the game.
See Also:
Controls.initialize(java.util.ArrayList)

getControls

public Controls getControls()
Returns:
The Controls instance assigned to the Configuration

public Display getDisplay()
Returns:
The Display instance assigned to the Configuration

getSound

public Sound getSound()
Returns:
The Sound instance assigned to the Configuration
